text: Poklonyaytes' Allakhu i ne priznavayte bozhestvom naryadu s nim nikogo. Delayte dobro roditelyam, rodstvennikam, sirotam, bednyakam, sosedyam, kak rodstvennikam, tak i ne sostoyashchim s vami v rodstve, sobrat'yam [po remeslu], putnikam i tem, kem vy vladeyete. Voistinu, Allakh ne lyubit gordetsov, spesivtsev
